summary: ONE OF THE FOUR COILPACKS ON MY 1.8T ENGINE HAS FAILED.  IT HAS BEEN BROUGHT TO MY ATTENTION THAT THIS IS A VERY COMMON PROBLEM.  I WAS TOLD THAT VW HAS REDESIGNED THE PART.  VW WILL ONLY REPLACE THE PART THAT FAILED.  ONCE THE PART FAILS THE CAR IS NOT DRIVABLE.  VW SHOULD RECALL ALL OF THE PASSATS WITH THIS ENGINE AND REPLACE THE FAULTY PARTS.
